channel.title: Compiling?
channel.description: How do I compile? Do i double click the compile-classes? or is there something else I have to do? I'm using Word to write anything wrong with that?

item.title: Compiling?
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

i wouldn’t suggest pasting all the server files in the jdk bin, not the smartest thing to do, if you’re using a source then you just need to run the compile.bat thats provided with the source, if you’re writing your server from scratch then you need to make a bat file that runs javac.exe from the jdk bin folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling?
item.dc:creator: @ryanl0 ryanl0
item.description:
@ryanl0 wrote:

yea click on it, if it dont work copy all files then go to :C-Programs-Java-Jdk-Bin and paste them all in the bin then it should work

Read full topic
